Fields¶

This file configures valid fields That are in Valid json configurations

class json_justify.fields.Array(field_name, min_len=-1, max_len=-1, js_model=None, validators=None, seq_validators=None)¶

This is Array Field This is Simple one with simple literals as their items like

class json_justify.fields.Boolean(field_name, validators=None)¶

This is Boolean Field

class json_justify.fields.Field(field_name, validators=None)¶

This is field which is used subset

data¶

This is used to get field data :return: data of field

register_error(key, value)¶

This Function is used to register error of the fields which is usually done by the validaors to reetister error

Args:
message (str): Description of the message
class json_justify.fields.Keyname(key, prefix=None)¶

This is used to assing key name in the field of the json

class json_justify.fields.Number(field_name, validators=None)¶

This Field is used to Create Numerical Fields

class json_justify.fields.String(field_name, validators=None)¶

This is Basic String Field
